channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kourtney Kardashian Goes All Out for Halloween with a Pumpkin Puppet Show, Booger Cookies and Skeleton Pirate Ship
item.description: Kourtney Kardashian Barker is claiming her title as The Queen of Halloween! The Lemme co-founder, 46, shared scenes from her family's spooky celebrations at the home she shares with her husband, Travis Barker, 49, and their baby son Rocky Thirteen, who has just turned two.
